mapper.insert: insert into replication_applier_status (CHANNEL_NAME, SERVICE_STATE, REMAINING_DELAY, COUNT_TRANSACTIONS_RETRIES) values (#{channelName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{serviceState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remainingDelay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{countTransactionsRetries,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select CHANNEL_NAME, SERVICE_STATE, REMAINING_DELAY, COUNT_TRANSACTIONS_RETRIES from replication_applier_status
